description: Intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasm (IPMN) is a type of cystic lesion of the pancreas that is characterized by the presence of mucin-producing cells within the pancreatic ductal system.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Presence of IPMN in the pancreas.

values.name: Present
values.description: IPMN is present in the pancreas.

values.name: Absent
values.description: IPMN is not present in the pancreas.

values.name: New suspected
values.description: There is a new suspected IPMN.

values.name: Main duct
values.description: IPMN is located in the main pancreatic duct.

values.name: Branch duct
values.description: IPMN is located in a branch pancreatic duct.

values.name: Mixed
values.description: IPMN is located in both main duct and branch ducts.

attributes.name: Communication with Pancreatic Duct
attributes.description: Presence of communication between the IPMN and the pancreatic duct.

values.name: Present
values.description: There is communication between the IPMN and the pancreatic duct.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There is no communication between the IPMN and the pancreatic duct.

attributes.name: Location in Pancreas
attributes.description: Location of the IPMN within the pancreas.

values.name: Uncinate
values.description: IPMN is located in the uncinate process of the pancreas.

values.name: Head
values.description: IPMN is located in the head of the pancreas.

values.name: Body
values.description: IPMN is located in the body of the pancreas.

values.name: Tail
values.description: IPMN is located in the tail of the pancreas.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: Size of the IPMN in millimeters.

attributes.name: Number of Cysts
attributes.description: Number of cysts associated with the IPMN.

values.name: Single
values.description: There is a single cyst associated with the IPMN.

values.name: Multiple
values.description: There are multiple cysts associated with the IPMN.

attributes.name: Main Pancreatic Ductal Dilation
attributes.description: Presence of main pancreatic ductal dilation.

values.name: Present
values.description: There is main pancreatic ductal dilation.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There is no main pancreatic ductal dilation.
